thread.section_title: Travelopod Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelopod | travelopod.com
thread.title: Viral Pandit

author: Viral Pandit
title: Viral Pandit
text: I was pleasantly surprised with Allen wilson's ability to work with me closely and made the transaction seamless and pleasant. I have used travelopod since last 4 years but around June/July 2015 I started to experience not so good service and switched to a different provider. After today's experience I will return to travelopod for my future needs. Thanks to Allen.
